channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘He lives paycheck to paycheck’: My husband pays his bills late and sits at home playing on his computer. How do I fix it?
item.description: “He seems to think ‘bill due’ dates are a suggestion. He has literally no savings.”

item.title: ‘I’m in a financial mess’: My income was cut in half. Do I sell my $600K home and kiss my 2.9% mortgage rate goodbye?
item.description: “We can move 10 miles south, where property is much cheaper.”

item.title: My siblings don’t earn nearly as much as me. Should my parents leave me less money in their will?
item.description: “I’m concerned that my parents are going to strike me from any will.”

item.title: I’m 83 and will have $500K if I sell my house. My estranged wife wants me to join her in Colombia. Do I go?
item.description: “I can just barely handle my expenses with a mortgage payment of $984 and an income of $3,800.”

item.title: I’m 53, a single parent with a $1 million home. My boyfriend wants to marry. Am I better off staying single?
item.description: “Should I just maintain the status quo or marry the love of my life?”
